articles.title: Virat Kohli opens up on 'strange' concussion substitution controversy in T20 opener - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: 'There were no plans of him being in the game'
articles.content:
Indian captain Virat Kohli has admitted there were "no plans" to play eventual Man of the Match Yuzvendra Chahal in the opening T20, before he was substituted into the game.
Chahal was brought into … [+1860 chars]
